title: The Autonomic nervous system
brief_description: Extraordinary photographs of living organs shows the autonomic nervous system controlling involuntary body processes such as breathing, heart rate, blood pressure and digestion. Animation is used to illustrate the sympathetic and parasympathetic divisions of the autonomic nervous system and the part it is thought to play in the human emotions. No other credits available.
